The print Statement

The ZKM Script print statement writes a specified string to standard out and the Zelix KlassMaster log. It can be useful for documenting the output of complex scripts.

Examples

print "Hello World";
print "Bye ""cruel"" World"; //cruel will appear with quotes

Syntax

"print" "\"" messageString "\"" ";"

where messageString is the string to write. You can embed quotes within the message string by using two consecutive quotes (ie. "") for each quote to be embedded.
